title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Flipped Learning-Based Autonomy Enhancement Course for Adult Scientist Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science terminology and digital device usage experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners must autonomously analyze pre-learning materials at least three times in a flipped learning environment to derive discussion points.
Learners must achieve over 80% of learning objectives based on peer feedback and instructor’s personalized support.
Learners must perform five or more collaborative activities and share learning materials using digital platforms.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
